name: Cheesy Mouse
description:
Keep mice out of your kitchen by shooting them down with cheese!

Your kitchen is being infested by mice! Use your leftover cheese to chase them away from your kitchen. Don't let any of them get past you or they will inflict permanent damage to your kitchen's healthiness.

--------------------------

CONTROLS

Left Mouse Button : Select / Charge and Shoot cheese

--------------------------

HELP

Cheesy Mouse is a 2D shooter. Use your mouse to aim your slingshot and hold the Left Mouse Button to charge your shot. Release the Left Mouse Button to shoot.

There are 3 levels of cheese for 3 types of mice:

- White mice take Level 1 cheese

- Gray mice take Level 2 cheese

- Black mice take Level 3 cheese

Don't let more than 5 mice get past you, or you will lose! 

Press ESCAPE to Pause the game
